name: ME1609_VT21_final_SenChaipetch
description:
Reducing the carbon pollution (almost) World Wide as a plant, the hero for better environment. PHOTOSYNTHESIS IS THE KEY to turn these carbons to better goods & for your own survival to victory!

___________________________________________________

Main Contents of the Photosynthesia: The Game

▶ Tutorials

Game starts with skippable "How-To-Play" tutorials. Higly recommended to go through it as a beginner.

▶ World Map

A menu-like area. Pick between actual levels, credits & others.

▶ Game Levels

A variety of different level styles; from a narrow world offering climing/jumping challenges to grand world worth to explore. 

OBS! Can't ESCape these levels (for now), collect certain amount points (sugar cubes) to exit world.

▶ Mini Game(s)

Arcade-style quick gameplay, also for shooting on other things than carbons, and/or collecting other game points than sugars.

▶ Credits

A page that credits other graphic and audio materials made by other authors.

___________________________________________________

Genre: Platformer

Main Theme: CO2 (Photosynthesis; a chemical process a plant does to "convert" carbons to sugar (glucose) and air (oxygen))

Developed by: Sen C(haipetch)
